amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate Federal Government operating subsidies of Amtrak.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the paragraph providing funding for Operating Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 283 (Roll no. 303).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 283 (Roll no. 303).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Brooks (AL).
